summary: It's almost Christmas but these three people are still on the road. The products don't sell, the car is a wreck and the weather is freezing. Moreover there is a problem: how to cope with an emerging friendship?
cast: Teppo Manner|Auli Mantila|Tuomas Airola|Marketta Immonen|Kati Kaartinen|Artur Kukov|Helena Kampman|Jukka Jauhiainen|Elina Marin|Katja Itäaho|Arto Appelgren|Ville Hartojoki|Kari Blinnikka|Jarmo Blinnikka|Jukka Hentilä|Ritva Torkkola|Jenna Hartojoki|Janne Kangasniemi|Hannu Koivikko|Anna Airola|Aaro Airola|Radiopuhelimet|Teemu Leskinen
title: Taulukauppiaat
